name: Final Factory Flux
description:
Build and ship as many products as quickly as you can before the factory's power runs out.

Selling goods pays for additional energy to keep the factory running.

This game is best played with local co-op but supports single player play.

Controls

Keyboard

  • WASD to move
  • E to grab/drop
  • F to prep
  • SHIFT to switch robots (in single player)

Xbox Controller

  • Left stick to move
  • A to grab/drop
  • X to prep
  • Y to switch robots (in single player)

Notes

  • Mac and Linux builds are untested. 
  • Windows build is recommended.
